title: Men's 100M Final | Athletics | Olympics 2024
description: The Men's 100m Final took place at Stade de France, on 04/08/24. Noah Lyles (USA) won Gold with a time of 9.79 seconds. Kishane Thompson (JAM) took Silver and Fred Kerley (USA) completed the podium.

title: Paris 2024 Olympics and Paralympics Games: Key Figures
description: With the ceremony on the evening of Sunday 8 September, the Paris 2024 Olympic and Paralympic Games came to an official and definitive close. Here's a look back at this extraordinary event in a few figures.

title: The Best of Paris 2024
description: Some of the best moments from the Paris 2024 Olympics and Paralympics Games.

title: Memories are forever
description: Here are some items that you can buy to remember the Paris 2024 Olympics and Paralympics Games.

title: Carlota: Providing herself and her sport to the world | The starting line
